Updating with our new matrix plotting function ```nilearn.plotting.plot_matrix``` in following examples:
 - examples/02_decoding/plot_haxby_multiclass.py
 - examples/03_connectivity/plot_group_level_connectivity.py
 - examples/03_connectivity/plot_multi_subject_connectome.py
 
This was discussed last week IRL with @GaelVaroquaux

The coolwarm cmap is not well adapted here: it's a symmetrical one, while the matrix goes from 0 to 1. We should use something like the "hot_r" (the hot, but "0" being white).
